attributes.action: change the benefit system such that it is only available to those without criminal records
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would save the law-abiding billions.  People can change, however, and we can have a time limit of, say 5 years with no convictions.  I would be happy to see this extended to NHS treatment etc.  One should only benefit from a modern and compassionate society if one lives by its rules.
